title: Remove duplicate equals buttons — keep only one = at right column bottom

requirements.text: In CalculatorKeypad, remove all extra '=' buttons from the keypad layout so that exactly one '=' button exists, positioned at the bottom of the right column.
acceptanceCriteria: Only one '=' button is visible in the calculator keypad.
The single '=' button is located at the bottom of the rightmost column.
No other '=' or equals-equivalent button appears anywhere else in the keypad grid.
Pressing '=' still correctly evaluates and displays the result.

constraints: Do not change backend logic or history functionality.
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new calculator operations or buttons.
